10011 
10012         if (!VerifyStringVal(strInbox))
10013         {
10014             OTAPI_Wrap::Output(0, "\n\n OT_API_LoadPaymentInbox: Failed.\n\n");
10015             return -1;
10016         }
10017         else // Success!
10018         {
10019             OTAPI_Wrap::Output(0, "\n\n"); // stderr
10020             //          print(strInbox)          // stdout
10021 
10022             int32_t nCount = OTAPI_Wrap::Ledger_GetCount(Server, MyNym, MyNym, strInbox);
10023             if (VerifyIntVal(nCount))
10024             {
10025                 if (nIndex > (nCount - 1))
10026                 {
10027                     OTAPI_Wrap::Output(0, "Index out of bounds. (There are " + to_string(nCount) + " indices, starting at 0.\n");
10028                     return -1;
10029                 }
10030 
10031                 OTAPI_Wrap::Output(0, "Ind  Amt   Type       Txn#   Memo\n");
10032                 OTAPI_Wrap::Output(0, "---------------------------------\n");
10033 
10034                 string strInstrument = OTAPI_Wrap::Ledger_GetInstrument(Server, MyNym, MyNym, strInbox, nIndex);
10035 
10036                 if (!VerifyStringVal(strInstrument))
10037                 {
10038                     OTAPI_Wrap::Output(0, "Failed trying to get payment instrument from payments box.\n");
10039                     return -1;
10040                 }
10041 
10042                 string strTrans = OTAPI_Wrap::Ledger_GetTransactionByIndex(Server, MyNym, MyNym, strInbox, nIndex);
10043                 int64_t lTransNumber = OTAPI_Wrap::Ledger_GetTransactionIDByIndex(Server, MyNym, MyNym, strInbox, nIndex);
10044 
10045                 int64_t lRefNum = OTAPI_Wrap::Transaction_GetDisplayReferenceToNum(Server, MyNym, MyNym, strTrans);
10046 
10047                 int64_t lAmount = OTAPI_Wrap::Instrmnt_GetAmount(strInstrument);
10048                 string strType = OTAPI_Wrap::Instrmnt_GetType(strInstrument);
10049                 string strAssetType = OTAPI_Wrap::Instrmnt_GetAssetID(strInstrument);  // todo: output this.
10050                 string strMemo = OTAPI_Wrap::Instrmnt_GetMemo(strInstrument);
10051                 string strSenderUserID = OTAPI_Wrap::Instrmnt_GetSenderUserID(strInstrument);
10052                 string strSenderAcctID = OTAPI_Wrap::Instrmnt_GetSenderAcctID(strInstrument);
10053                 string strRemitterUserID = OTAPI_Wrap::Instrmnt_GetRemitterUserID(strInstrument);
10054                 string strRemitterAcctID = OTAPI_Wrap::Instrmnt_GetRemitterAcctID(strInstrument);
10055                 string strRecipientUserID = OTAPI_Wrap::Instrmnt_GetRecipientUserID(strInstrument);
10056                 string strRecipientAcctID = OTAPI_Wrap::Instrmnt_GetRecipientAcctID(strInstrument);
10057 
10058                 string strUserID = VerifyStringVal(strRemitterUserID) ? strRemitterUserID : strSenderUserID;
10059                 string strAcctID = VerifyStringVal(strRemitterAcctID) ? strRemitterAcctID : strSenderAcctID;
10060 
10061                 bool bUserIDExists = VerifyStringVal(strUserID);
10062                 bool bAcctIDExists = VerifyStringVal(strAcctID);
10063                 bool bAssetIDExists = VerifyStringVal(strAssetType);
10064                 bool bMemoExists = VerifyStringVal(strMemo);
10065 
10066                 bool bHasAmount = VerifyIntVal(lAmount);
10067 
10068 
10069                 if (bMemoExists && (strMemo.find("\n") != string::npos) && !bShowLargeMemo)
10070                 {
10071                     strMemo = "<too large to display here>";
10072                 }
10073                 else if (bMemoExists)
10074                 {
10075                     string strTempMemo = "\"" + strMemo + "\"";
10076                     strMemo = strTempMemo;
10077                 }
10078 
10079                 string strNewlineSeparator = "";
10080 
10081                 if (bUserIDExists || bAcctIDExists)
10082                 {
10083                     strNewlineSeparator = "\n";
10084                 }
10085 
10086                 string strSeparator = (!bUserIDExists && !bAcctIDExists && !bAssetIDExists) ? "" : strNewlineSeparator;
10087 
10088                 // Set up some symbols to appear or not,
10089                 // based on whether there is something to show.
10090                 //
10091                 string strUserDenoter = (bUserIDExists ? "U:" : "");
10092                 string strUserDenoter2 = (bUserIDExists ? " - " : "");
10093                 string strAcctDenoter = (bAcctIDExists ? "A:" : "");
10094                 string strAcctDenoter2 = (bAcctIDExists ? " - " : "");
10095                 string strAssetDenoter = (bAssetIDExists ? "T:" : "");
10096                 string strAssetDenoter2 = (bAssetIDExists ? " - " : "");
10097 
10098                 // If we have the user/acct/asset ID, then get the associated name (if that exists.)
10099                 //
10100                 string strUserName = (bUserIDExists ? ("\"" + OTAPI_Wrap::GetNym_Name(strUserID) + "\"") : "");
10101                 string strAcctName = (bAcctIDExists ? ("\"" + OTAPI_Wrap::GetAccountWallet_Name(strAcctID) + "\"") : "");
10102                 string strAssetName = (bAssetIDExists ? ("\"" + OTAPI_Wrap::GetAssetType_Name(strAssetType) + "\"") : "");
10103 
10104                 // Just making sure here that if the string wasn't there, that it's set to
10105                 // a proper empty string, instead of a null or a "not a value" value.
10106                 //
10107                 if (!VerifyStringVal(strUserName))      { strUserName = ""; strUserDenoter2 = ""; }
10108                 if (!VerifyStringVal(strAcctName))      { strAcctName = ""; strAcctDenoter2 = ""; }
10109                 if (!VerifyStringVal(strAssetName))     { strAssetName = ""; strAssetDenoter2 = ""; }
10110 
10111                 if ("\"\"" == strUserName)              { strUserName = ""; strUserDenoter2 = ""; }
10112                 if ("\"\"" == strAcctName)              { strAcctName = ""; strAcctDenoter2 = ""; }
10113                 if ("\"\"" == strAssetName)             { strAssetName = ""; strAssetDenoter2 = ""; }
10114 
10115                 string strOut1 = to_string(nIndex) + "    ";
10116 
10117                 string strOut2 = "      ";
10118 
10119                 if (bAssetIDExists && bHasAmount)
10120                 {
10121                     strOut2 = OTAPI_Wrap::FormatAmount(strAssetType, lAmount) + (OTAPI_Wrap::FormatAmount(strAssetType, lAmount).size() < 3 ? "    " : "   ");
10122                 }
10123 
10124                 string strOut3 = strType;
10125                 string strOut4 = strType.size() > 10 ? " " : "    ";
10126                 string strOut5 = to_string(lTransNumber) + (to_string(lTransNumber).size() < 2 ? "    " : "   ");
10127                 string strOut6 = (bMemoExists ? (strMemo) : "") + "\n";
10128                 string strOut7 = strUserDenoter + strUserID + strUserDenoter2 + strUserName + strSeparator;
10129                 string strOut8 = strAcctDenoter + strAcctID + strAcctDenoter2 + strAcctName + strSeparator;
10130                 string strOut9 = strAssetDenoter + strAssetType + strAssetDenoter2 + strAssetName;
10131 
10132                 print(strOut1 + strOut2 + strOut3 + strOut4 + strOut5 + strOut6 + strOut7 + strOut8 + strOut9);
10133 
10134                 print("Instrument:\n" + strInstrument);
10135 
10136             } // VerifyIntVal (nCount)
10137 
10138             //          OTAPI_Wrap::Output(0, "\n\n") // stderr
10139             return 1;
10140         }
10141     }
10142     return -1;
10143 }
10144 
10145 
10146 OT_COMMANDS_OT int32_t OT_Command::main_show_incoming()
10147 {
10148     int32_t nShowPayments = -1;
10149     int32_t nShowInbox = -1;
10150 
10151     if (VerifyExists("MyAcct", false))
10152     {
10153         nShowInbox = OT_Command::main_show_inbox();
10154     }
10155     else
10156     {
10157         OTAPI_Wrap::Output(0, "Try adding --myacct ASSET_ACCT_ID   (to see the asset account's inbox.)\n");
10158     }
10159 
10160     if (VerifyExists("Server", false) && VerifyExists("MyNym", false))
10161     {
10162         nShowPayments = OT_Command::main_show_payments_inbox();
10163     }
10164     else
10165     {
10166         OTAPI_Wrap::Output(0, "Try adding --mynym NYM_ID  and  --server SERVER_ID\n(to see the payments inbox for that Server and Nym.)\n");
10167     }
10168 
10169     if ((nShowInbox > -1) || (nShowPayments > -1))
10170     {
10171         return 1;
10172     }
10173 
10174     return -1;
10175 }
10176 
10177 
10178 OT_COMMANDS_OT int32_t OT_Command::main_show_outgoing()
10179 {
10180     int32_t nShowPayments = -1;
10181     int32_t nShowOutbox = -1;
10182 
10183     if (VerifyExists("MyAcct", false))
10184     {
10185         nShowOutbox = OT_Command::main_show_outbox();
10186     }
10187     else
10188     {
10189         OTAPI_Wrap::Output(0, "Try adding --myacct ASSET_ACCT_ID   (to see the asset account's outbox.)\n");
10190     }
10191 
10192     if (VerifyExists("MyNym", false))
10193     {
10194         nShowPayments = OT_Command::main_show_outpayment();
10195     }
10196     else
10197     {
10198         OTAPI_Wrap::Output(0, "Try adding --mynym NYM_ID (to see the outpayment box for that Nym.)\n");
10199     }
10200 
10201     if ((nShowOutbox > -1) || (nShowPayments > -1))
10202     {
10203         return 1;
10204     }
10205 
10206     return -1;
10207 }
10208 
10209 
10210 OT_COMMANDS_OT int32_t OT_Command::main_show_payments_inbox()
10211 {
10212     // SHOW PAYMENTS INBOX
10213     //
10214     // Load an asset account's payments inbox from local storage and display it on the screen.
10215     //
10216 
10217     if (VerifyExists("Server") && VerifyExists("MyNym"))
10218     {
10219         // ***************************************************************
10220 
10221         string strInbox = OTAPI_Wrap::LoadPaymentInbox(Server, MyNym); // Returns NULL, or an inbox.
10222 
10223         if (!VerifyStringVal(strInbox))
10224         {
10225             OTAPI_Wrap::Output(0, "\n Unable to load the payments inbox (probably doesn't exist yet.)\n(Nym/Server: " + MyNym + " / " + Server + " )\n\n");
10226             return -1;
10227         }
10228         else // Success!
10229         {
10230             OTAPI_Wrap::Output(0, "\n"); // stderr
10231             //          print(strInbox)          // stdout
10232 
10233             int32_t nCount = OTAPI_Wrap::Ledger_GetCount(Server, MyNym, MyNym, strInbox);
10234             if (VerifyIntVal(nCount))
10235             {
10236                 if (nCount > 0)
10237                 {
10238                     OTAPI_Wrap::Output(0, "Show payments inbox (Nym/Server)\n( " + MyNym + " / " + Server + " )\n");
10239                     OTAPI_Wrap::Output(0, "Idx  Amt   Type      Txn#  Asset_Type\n");
10240                     OTAPI_Wrap::Output(0, "---------------------------------------\n");
10241 
10242                     for (int32_t nIndex = 0; nIndex < nCount; ++nIndex)
10243                     {
10244                         string strInstrument = OTAPI_Wrap::Ledger_GetInstrument(Server, MyNym, MyNym, strInbox, nIndex);
10245 
10246                         if (!VerifyStringVal(strInstrument))
10247                         {
10248                             OTAPI_Wrap::Output(0, "Failed trying to get payment instrument from payments box.\n");
10249                             return -1;
10250                         }
10251 
10252                         string strTrans = OTAPI_Wrap::Ledger_GetTransactionByIndex(Server, MyNym, MyNym, strInbox, nIndex);
10253                         int64_t lTransNumber = OTAPI_Wrap::Ledger_GetTransactionIDByIndex(Server, MyNym, MyNym, strInbox, nIndex);
10254 
10255                         string strTransID = VerifyIntVal(lTransNumber) ? to_string(lTransNumber) : "UNKNOWN_TRANS_NUM";
10256 
10257                         int64_t lRefNum = OTAPI_Wrap::Transaction_GetDisplayReferenceToNum(Server, MyNym, MyNym, strTrans);
10258                         //                      string strAmount          = OTAPI_Wrap::Transaction_GetAmount(Server, MyNym, MyNym, strTrans)
10259                         //                      string strType            = OTAPI_Wrap::Transaction_GetType(Server, MyNym, MyNym, strTrans)
10260                         //                      string strSenderUserID    = OTAPI_Wrap::Transaction_GetSenderUserID(Server, MyNym, MyNym, strTrans)
10261                         //                      string strSenderAcctID    = OTAPI_Wrap::Transaction_GetSenderAcctID(Server, MyNym, MyNym, strTrans)
10262                         //                      string strRecipientUserID = OTAPI_Wrap::Transaction_GetRecipientUserID(Server, MyNym, MyNym, strTrans)
10263                         //                      string strRecipientAcctID = OTAPI_Wrap::Transaction_GetRecipientAcctID(Server, MyNym, MyNym, strTrans)
10264 
10265                         //                      string strRefNum          = OTAPI_Wrap::Transaction_GetDisplayReferenceToNum(Server, MyNym, MyNym, strTrans)
10266                         int64_t lAmount = OTAPI_Wrap::Instrmnt_GetAmount(strInstrument);
10267                         string strType = OTAPI_Wrap::Instrmnt_GetType(strInstrument);
10268                         string strAssetType = OTAPI_Wrap::Instrmnt_GetAssetID(strInstrument);  // todo: output this.
10269                         string strSenderUserID = OTAPI_Wrap::Instrmnt_GetSenderUserID(strInstrument);
10270                         string strSenderAcctID = OTAPI_Wrap::Instrmnt_GetSenderAcctID(strInstrument);
10271                         string strRecipientUserID = OTAPI_Wrap::Instrmnt_GetRecipientUserID(strInstrument);
10272                         string strRecipientAcctID = OTAPI_Wrap::Instrmnt_GetRecipientAcctID(strInstrument);
10273 
10274                         string strUserID = VerifyStringVal(strSenderUserID) ? strSenderUserID : strRecipientUserID;
10275                         string strAcctID = VerifyStringVal(strSenderAcctID) ? strSenderAcctID : strRecipientAcctID;
10276 
10277                         bool bHasAmount = VerifyIntVal(lAmount);
10278                         bool bHasAsset = VerifyStringVal(strAssetType);
10279 
10280                         string strAmount = (bHasAmount && bHasAsset) ? OTAPI_Wrap::FormatAmount(strAssetType, lAmount) : "UNKNOWN_AMOUNT";
10281 
10282                         bool bUserIDExists = VerifyStringVal(strUserID);
10283                         bool bAcctIDExists = VerifyStringVal(strAcctID);
10284                         bool bAssetIDExists = VerifyStringVal(strAssetType);
10285 
10286                         string strAssetDenoter = (bAssetIDExists ? " - " : "");
10287 
10288                         string strAssetName = (bAssetIDExists ? ("\"" + OTAPI_Wrap::GetAssetType_Name(strAssetType) + "\"") : "");
10289                         if (!VerifyStringVal(strAssetName))     { strAssetName = ""; strAssetDenoter = ""; }
10290 
10291                         string strOut1 = to_string(nIndex) + "    ";
10292                         string strOut2 = strAmount + (strAmount.size() < 3 ? "    " : "   ");
10293                         string strOut3 = strType;
10294                         string strOut4 = strType.size() > 10 ? " " : "    ";
10295                         string strOut5 = strTransID + (strTransID.size() < 2 ? "    " : "   ");
10296                         string strOut6 = strAssetType + strAssetDenoter + strAssetName;
10297 
10298                         print(strOut1 + strOut2 + strOut3 + strOut4 + strOut5 + strOut6);
10299                     } // for
10300 
10301                     OTAPI_Wrap::Output(0, "\n For the above, try: acceptpayments, acceptinvoices, acceptmoney, or acceptall.\n EXCEPT for smart contracts and payment plans -- for those, use: opentxs confirm\n\n");
10302                 } // if nCount > 0
10303                 else
10304                 {
10305                     OTAPI_Wrap::Output(0, "\n Payments inbox is empty (Nym/Server: " + MyNym + " / " + Server + " )\n");
10306                 }
10307             } // VerifyIntVal (nCount)
10308 
10309             return 1;
10310         }
10311     }
10312     return -1;
10313 }
10314 
10315 
10316 OT_COMMANDS_OT int32_t OT_Command::details_show_record(const string & strServerID, const string & strMyNymID, const string & strMyAcctID, const int32_t nIndex, const string & strRecordBox)
10317 {
10318     if (!VerifyStringVal(strRecordBox))
10319     {
10320         OTAPI_Wrap::Output(0, "\n\n details_show_record: strRecordBox is empty.\n(Need to load it first before calling this function.)\n\n");
10321         return false;
10322     }
10323 
10324     // Success!
10325     //
10326     string strTrans = OTAPI_Wrap::Ledger_GetTransactionByIndex(strServerID, strMyNymID, strMyAcctID, strRecordBox, nIndex);
10327     int64_t lTransID = OTAPI_Wrap::Ledger_GetTransactionIDByIndex(strServerID, strMyNymID, strMyAcctID, strRecordBox, nIndex);
10328     int64_t lRefNum = OTAPI_Wrap::Transaction_GetDisplayReferenceToNum(strServerID, strMyNymID, strMyAcctID, strTrans);
10329     int64_t lAmount = OTAPI_Wrap::Transaction_GetAmount(strServerID, strMyNymID, strMyAcctID, strTrans);
10330     string strType = OTAPI_Wrap::Transaction_GetType(strServerID, strMyNymID, strMyAcctID, strTrans);
10331     string strSenderUserID = OTAPI_Wrap::Transaction_GetSenderUserID(strServerID, strMyNymID, strMyAcctID, strTrans);
10332     string strSenderAcctID = OTAPI_Wrap::Transaction_GetSenderAcctID(strServerID, strMyNymID, strMyAcctID, strTrans);
10333     string strRecipientUserID = OTAPI_Wrap::Transaction_GetRecipientUserID(strServerID, strMyNymID, strMyAcctID, strTrans);
10334     string strRecipientAcctID = OTAPI_Wrap::Transaction_GetRecipientAcctID(strServerID, strMyNymID, strMyAcctID, strTrans);
10335 
10336     string strUserID = VerifyStringVal(strSenderUserID) ? strSenderUserID : strRecipientUserID;
10337     string strAcctID = VerifyStringVal(strSenderAcctID) ? strSenderAcctID : strRecipientAcctID;
10338 
10339     bool bUserIDExists = VerifyStringVal(strUserID);
10340     bool bAcctIDExists = VerifyStringVal(strAcctID);
10341 
10342     string strNewlineSeparator = "";
10343 
10344     if (bUserIDExists || bAcctIDExists)
10345     {
10346         strNewlineSeparator = "\n                                 |";
10347     }
10348 
10349     string strSeparator = (!bUserIDExists && !bAcctIDExists) ? "" : strNewlineSeparator;
10350 
10351     string strUserDenoter = (bUserIDExists ? "U:" : "");
10352     string strAcctDenoter = (bAcctIDExists ? "A:" : "");
10353 
10354     string strAssetTypeID = bAcctIDExists ? OTAPI_Wrap::GetAccountWallet_AssetTypeID(strAcctID) : "";
10355 
10356     bool bHasAmount = VerifyIntVal(lAmount);
10357     bool bHasAsset = VerifyStringVal(strAssetTypeID);
10358 
10359     string strAmount = bHasAmount ? (bHasAsset ? OTAPI_Wrap::FormatAmount(strAssetTypeID, lAmount) : to_string(lAmount)) : "UNKNOWN_AMOUNT";
10360 
10361     OTAPI_Wrap::Output(0, to_string(nIndex) + "    ");
10362     OTAPI_Wrap::Output(0, strAmount + (strAmount.size() < 3 ? "    " : "   "));
10363     OTAPI_Wrap::Output(0, strType);
10364     OTAPI_Wrap::Output(0, strType.size() > 10 ? " " : "    ");
10365     OTAPI_Wrap::Output(0, to_string(lTransID) + (to_string(lTransID).size() < 2 ? "    " : "   "));
10366     OTAPI_Wrap::Output(0, to_string(lRefNum) + (to_string(lRefNum).size() > 2 ? "  " : " ") + "|");
10367     OTAPI_Wrap::Output(0, strUserDenoter + strUserID + strSeparator + strAcctDenoter + strAcctID + "\n");
10368 
10369     return true;
10370 }
10371 
10372 
10373 OT_COMMANDS_OT int32_t OT_Command::details_show_records(const string & strServerID, const string & strMyNymID, const string & strMyAcctID)
10374 {
10375     string strRecordBox = OTAPI_Wrap::LoadRecordBox(strServerID, strMyNymID, strMyAcctID); // Returns NULL, or a record box.
10376 
10377     if (!VerifyStringVal(strRecordBox))
10378     {
10379         OTAPI_Wrap::Output(0, "\n\n details_show_records: OT_API_LoadRecordBox: Failed.\n\n");
10380         return -1;
10381     }
10382     // Success!
10383     OTAPI_Wrap::Output(0, "\n\n"); // stderr
10384     //  print(strRecordBox)      // stdout
10385 
10386     int32_t nCount = OTAPI_Wrap::Ledger_GetCount(strServerID, strMyNymID, strMyAcctID, strRecordBox);
10387     if (VerifyIntVal(nCount))
10388     {
10389         OTAPI_Wrap::Output(0, "SHOW RECORDS: \n\n");
10390         OTAPI_Wrap::Output(0, "Idx  Amt  Type        Txn# InRef#|User / Acct\n");
10391         OTAPI_Wrap::Output(0, "---------------------------------|(from or to)\n");
10392 
10393         for (int32_t nIndex = 0; nIndex < nCount; ++nIndex)
10394         {
10395             if (!details_show_record(strServerID, strMyNymID, strMyAcctID, nIndex, strRecordBox))
10396             {
10397                 OTAPI_Wrap::Output(0, "details_show_records: Error calling details_show_record.\n");
10398                 return -1;
10399             }
10400         } // for
10401     } // VerifyIntVal (nCount)
10402 
10403     return 1;
10404 }
10405 
10406 
10407 OT_COMMANDS_OT int32_t OT_Command::main_show_records()
10408 {
10409     string strLocation = "main_show_records";
10410 
10411     // SHOW RECORD BOX
10412     //
10413     // Load an asset account's record box from local storage and display it on the screen.
10414     //
10415     bool bNymExists = VerifyExists("MyNym", false);
10416     bool bAcctExists = VerifyExists("MyAcct", false);
10417     bool bBothExist = (bNymExists &&  bAcctExists);
10418     bool bShowNymOnly = (bNymExists && !bAcctExists);
10419 
10420     //
10421     string strMyNymID = "";
10422 
10423     if (bShowNymOnly)
10424     {
10425         strMyNymID = MyNym;
10426     }
10427     else if (bAcctExists)
10428     {
10429         strMyNymID = OTAPI_Wrap::GetAccountWallet_NymID(MyAcct);
10430     }
10431     else
10432     {
10433         OTAPI_Wrap::Output(0, strLocation + ": This should never happen. (1)\n");
10434         return -1;
10435     }
10436 
10437     if (!VerifyStringVal(strMyNymID))
10438     {
10439         // if bShowNymOnly is true, then we KNOW MyNym is the Nym, and we ALREADY know he's
10440         // good, since we called VerifyExists at the top of this function. (MyNym, unlike HisNym,
10441         // is verified against the wallet, so we KNOW it's there.)
10442         // Therefore, if strMyNymID doesn't contain a proper string, then we KNOW bShowNymOnly
10443         // must have been false, and that OTAPI_Wrap::GetAccountWallet_NymID(MyAcct) was the call that
10444         // failed. Thus, the error message is appropriate to the latter case and not the former.
10445         //
10446         OTAPI_Wrap::Output(0, strLocation + ": Unable to find NymID based on myacct. Try a different account or nym, using --myacct ACCT_ID or --mynym NYM_ID\n");
10447         return -1;
10448     }
10449     if (bBothExist && !(strMyNymID == MyNym))
10450     {
10451         OTAPI_Wrap::Output(0, strLocation + ": MyNym (" + MyNym + ") is not the same nym who owns MyAcct.\nTo override using MyAcct's owner nym, add:  --mynym (" + strMyNymID + ")\n");
10452         return -1;
10453     }
10454 
10455     // HERE, WE LOOK UP THE SERVER ID, BASED ON THE ACCOUNT ID.
10456     //
10457     string strServerID = "";
10458 
10459     if (bAcctExists)
10460     {
10461         strServerID = OTAPI_Wrap::GetAccountWallet_ServerID(MyAcct);
10462     }
10463     else if (VerifyExists("Server", false))
10464     {
10465         strServerID = Server;
10466     }
10467     else
10468     {
10469         OTAPI_Wrap::Output(0, strLocation + ": Server was not specified, and either MyAcct wasn't specified either, or if it was, I was unable to find any ServerID associated with MyAcct.\nTry a different account or different server, using --myacct ACCT_ID or --server SERVER_ID \n\n");
10470         return -1;
10471     }
10472 
10473     if (!VerifyStringVal(strServerID))
10474     {
10475         OTAPI_Wrap::Output(0, strLocation + ": Unable to find Server ID.\nTry: --server SERVER_ID\nYou might also try: --myacct ACCT_ID  (It will find the server ID based on the account.)\n");
10476         return -1;
10477     }
10478     // ***************************************************************
10479     //
10480     // REMEMBER, recordbox for MyAcct contains the old inbox receipts.
10481     // Whereas recordbox for MyNym contains the old payments (in and out.)
10482     // In the case of the latter, the NYM must be passed as the ACCT...
10483     //
10484     // Meaning: there are TWO record boxes. So must there thus be two commands
10485     // for viewing them? Or do we combine them somehow?
10487     // ===> I say combine them, since they are for viewing only (nothing is actually done
10488     // with the records -- they're just there for the actual client to take and store
10489     // however it wishes.)
10490     //
10491     OTAPI_Wrap::Output(0, "\n\nNote: OT is completely done with these records. A proper GUI will sweep them out\nperiodically and archive them somewhere, or just erase them. All you can do at the\ncommand line (using this tool) is view them, or erase them using: opentxs clearrecords \n\n");
10492     OTAPI_Wrap::Output(0, "\nArchived Nym-related records (" + strMyNymID + "): \n");
10493     int32_t nNymRecords = details_show_records(strServerID, strMyNymID, strMyNymID);
10494     OTAPI_Wrap::Output(0, "--------------------------------------------------------------\n");
10495 
10496     int32_t nAcctRecords = 1;
10497 
10498     if (bAcctExists)
10499     {
10500         OTAPI_Wrap::Output(0, "\nArchived Account-related records (" + MyAcct + "): \n");
10501         nAcctRecords = details_show_records(strServerID, strMyNymID, MyAcct);
10502     }
10503 
10504     if (2 == (nNymRecords + nAcctRecords))
10505     {
10506         return 1; // success.
10507     }
10508 
10509     return -1;
10510 }
10511 
10512 
10513 OT_COMMANDS_OT int32_t OT_Command::details_clear_records(const string & strServerID, const string & strMyNymID, const string & strMyAcctID)
10514 {
10515     bool bTrue = true;
10516     bool bCleared = OTAPI_Wrap::ClearRecord(strServerID, strMyNymID, strMyAcctID, 0, bTrue); // nIndex=0 (ignored when clearing all), ClearAll = true.
10517 
10518     return bCleared ? 1 : -1;
10519 }
10520 
10521 
10522 OT_COMMANDS_OT int32_t OT_Command::main_clear_records()
10523 {
10524     string strLocation = "main_clear_records";
10525 
10526     OTAPI_Wrap::Output(0, " Usage:      opentxs clearrecords\n\n");
10527 
10528 
10529     // CLEAR RECORD BOX
10530     //
10531     // Load an asset account's record box from local storage and display it on the screen.
10532     //
10533     bool bNymExists = VerifyExists("MyNym", false);
10534     bool bAcctExists = VerifyExists("MyAcct", false);
10535     bool bBothExist = (bNymExists &&  bAcctExists);
10536     bool bShowNymOnly = (bNymExists && !bAcctExists);
10537 
10538     //
10539     string strMyNymID = "";
10540 
10541     if (bShowNymOnly)
10542     {
10543         strMyNymID = MyNym;
10544     }
10545     else if (bAcctExists)
10546     {
10547         strMyNymID = OTAPI_Wrap::GetAccountWallet_NymID(MyAcct);
10548     }
10549     else
10550     {
10551         OTAPI_Wrap::Output(0, strLocation + ": This should never happen. (1)\n");
10552         return -1;
10553     }
10554 
10555     if (!VerifyStringVal(strMyNymID))
10556     {
10557         // if bShowNymOnly is true, then we KNOW MyNym is the Nym, and we ALREADY know he's
10558         // good, since we called VerifyExists at the top of this function. (MyNym, unlike HisNym,
10559         // is verified against the wallet, so we KNOW it's there.)
10560         // Therefore, if strMyNymID doesn't contain a proper string, then we KNOW bShowNymOnly
10561         // must have been false, and that OTAPI_Wrap::GetAccountWallet_NymID(MyAcct) was the call that
10562         // failed. Thus, the error message is appropriate to the latter case and not the former.
10563         //
10564         OTAPI_Wrap::Output(0, strLocation + ": Unable to find NymID based on myacct. Try a different account or nym, using --myacct ACCT_ID or --mynym NYM_ID\n");
10565         return -1;
10566     }
10567     if (bBothExist && !(strMyNymID == MyNym))
10568     {
10569         OTAPI_Wrap::Output(0, strLocation + ": MyNym (" + MyNym + ") is not the same nym who owns MyAcct.\nTo override using MyAcct's owner nym, add:  --mynym (" + strMyNymID + ")\n");
10570         return -1;
10571     }
10572 
10573     // HERE, WE LOOK UP THE SERVER ID, BASED ON THE ACCOUNT ID.
10574     //
10575     string strServerID = "";
10576 
10577     if (bAcctExists)
10578     {
10579         strServerID = OTAPI_Wrap::GetAccountWallet_ServerID(MyAcct);
10580     }
10581     else if (VerifyExists("Server", false))
10582     {
10583         strServerID = Server;
10584     }
10585     else
10586     {
10587         OTAPI_Wrap::Output(0, strLocation + ": Server was not specified, and either MyAcct wasn't specified either, or if it was, I was unable to find any ServerID associated with MyAcct.\nTry a different account or different server, using --myacct ACCT_ID or --server SERVER_ID \n\n");
10588         return -1;
10589     }
10590 
10591     if (!VerifyStringVal(strServerID))
10592     {
10593         OTAPI_Wrap::Output(0, strLocation + ": Unable to find Server ID.\nTry: --server SERVER_ID\nYou might also try: --myacct ACCT_ID  (It will find the server ID based on the account.)\n");
10594         return -1;
10595     }
10596     // ***************************************************************
10597     //
10598     // REMEMBER, recordbox for MyAcct contains the old inbox receipts.
10599     // Whereas recordbox for MyNym contains the old payments (in and out.)
10600     // In the case of the latter, the NYM must be passed as the ACCT...
10601     //
10602     // Meaning: there are TWO record boxes.
10603     //
10604     OTAPI_Wrap::Output(0, "\n Clearing archived Nym-related records (" + strMyNymID + ")... \n");
10605     int32_t nNymRecords = details_clear_records(strServerID, strMyNymID, strMyNymID);
10606     OTAPI_Wrap::Output(0, "--------------------------------------------------------------\n");
10607     OTAPI_Wrap::Output(0, "\nClearing archived Account-related records (" + MyAcct + ")... \n");
10608     int32_t nAcctRecords = details_clear_records(strServerID, strMyNymID, MyAcct);
10609 
10610     if (2 == (nNymRecords + nAcctRecords))
10611     {
10612         return 1; // success.
10613     }
10614 
10615     return -1;
10616 }
10617 
10618 
10619 OT_COMMANDS_OT int32_t OT_Command::details_clear_expired(const string & strServerID, const string & strMyNymID)
10620 {
10621     bool bTrue = true;
10622     bool bCleared = OTAPI_Wrap::ClearExpired(strServerID, strMyNymID, 0, bTrue); // nIndex=0 (ignored when clearing all), ClearAll = true.
10623 
10624     return bCleared ? 1 : -1;
10625 }
10626 
10627 
10628 OT_COMMANDS_OT int32_t OT_Command::main_clear_expired()
10629 {
10630     OTAPI_Wrap::Output(0, " Usage:      opentxs clearexpired\n\n");
10631 
10632     // CLEAR EXPIRED BOX
10633     //
10634     if (VerifyExists("MyNym") && VerifyExists("Server"))
10635     {
10636         string strMyNymID = MyNym;
10637         string strServerID = Server;
10638 
10639         //
10640         // expiredBox for MyNym contains the old payments (in and out.)
10641         //
10642         OTAPI_Wrap::Output(0, "\n Clearing archived Nym-related expired records (" + strMyNymID + ")... \n");
10643 
10644         return details_clear_expired(strServerID, strMyNymID);
10645     }
10646 
10647     return -1;
10648 }
10649 
10650 
10651 // TODO: This is based on details_show_record which assumes it can contain asset inbox records as well
10652 // as payment inbox records. But in fact, the expired box can ONLY contain payment records, not asset
10653 // account records. So at some point, we will want to update this function to use the Instrument calls
10654 // instead of the typical transaction calls, since that is more appropriate in this case. In fact we
10655 // will also want to update details_show_record to do the same thing, in cases where the nymID and
10656 // the account ID are the same.
10657 //
10658 OT_COMMANDS_OT int32_t OT_Command::details_show_expired(const string & strServerID, const string & strMyNymID, const int32_t nIndex, const string & strExpiredBox)
10659 {
10660     if (!VerifyStringVal(strExpiredBox))
10661     {
10662         OTAPI_Wrap::Output(0, "\n\n details_show_expired: strExpiredBox is empty.\n(Need to load it first before calling this function.)\n\n");
10663         return false;
10664     }
10665 
10666     // Success!
10667     //
10668     string strTrans = OTAPI_Wrap::Ledger_GetTransactionByIndex(strServerID, strMyNymID, strMyNymID, strExpiredBox, nIndex);
10669     int64_t lTransID = OTAPI_Wrap::Ledger_GetTransactionIDByIndex(strServerID, strMyNymID, strMyNymID, strExpiredBox, nIndex);
10670     int64_t lRefNum = OTAPI_Wrap::Transaction_GetDisplayReferenceToNum(strServerID, strMyNymID, strMyNymID, strTrans);
10671     int64_t lAmount = OTAPI_Wrap::Transaction_GetAmount(strServerID, strMyNymID, strMyNymID, strTrans);
10672     string strType = OTAPI_Wrap::Transaction_GetType(strServerID, strMyNymID, strMyNymID, strTrans);
10673     string strSenderUserID = OTAPI_Wrap::Transaction_GetSenderUserID(strServerID, strMyNymID, strMyNymID, strTrans);
10674     string strSenderAcctID = OTAPI_Wrap::Transaction_GetSenderAcctID(strServerID, strMyNymID, strMyNymID, strTrans);
10675     string strRecipientUserID = OTAPI_Wrap::Transaction_GetRecipientUserID(strServerID, strMyNymID, strMyNymID, strTrans);
10676     string strRecipientAcctID = OTAPI_Wrap::Transaction_GetRecipientAcctID(strServerID, strMyNymID, strMyNymID, strTrans);
10677 
10678     string strUserID = VerifyStringVal(strSenderUserID) ? strSenderUserID : strRecipientUserID;
10679     string strAcctID = VerifyStringVal(strSenderAcctID) ? strSenderAcctID : strRecipientAcctID;
10680 
10681     bool bUserIDExists = VerifyStringVal(strUserID);
10682     bool bAcctIDExists = VerifyStringVal(strAcctID);
10683 
10684     string strNewlineSeparator = "";
10685 
10686     if (bUserIDExists || bAcctIDExists)
10687     {
10688         strNewlineSeparator = "\n                                 |";
10689     }
10690 
10691     string strSeparator = (!bUserIDExists && !bAcctIDExists) ? "" : strNewlineSeparator;
10692 
10693     string strUserDenoter = (bUserIDExists ? "U:" : "");
10694     string strAcctDenoter = (bAcctIDExists ? "A:" : "");
10695 
10696     string strAssetTypeID = bAcctIDExists ? OTAPI_Wrap::GetAccountWallet_AssetTypeID(strAcctID) : "";
10697 
10698     string strAmount = VerifyIntVal(lAmount) ? (VerifyStringVal(strAssetTypeID) ? OTAPI_Wrap::FormatAmount(strAssetTypeID, lAmount) : to_string(lAmount)) : "UNKNOWN_AMOUNT";
10699 
10700     OTAPI_Wrap::Output(0, to_string(nIndex) + "    ");
10701     OTAPI_Wrap::Output(0, strAmount + (strAmount.size() < 3 ? "    " : "   "));
10702     OTAPI_Wrap::Output(0, strType);
10703     OTAPI_Wrap::Output(0, strType.size() > 10 ? " " : "    ");
10704     OTAPI_Wrap::Output(0, to_string(lTransID) + (to_string(lTransID).size() < 2 ? "    " : "   "));
10705     OTAPI_Wrap::Output(0, to_string(lRefNum) + (to_string(lRefNum).size() > 2 ? "  " : " ") + "|");
10706     OTAPI_Wrap::Output(0, strUserDenoter + strUserID + strSeparator + strAcctDenoter + strAcctID + "\n");
10707 
10708     return true;
10709 }
10710 
10711 
10712 OT_COMMANDS_OT int32_t OT_Command::details_show_expired_records(const string & strServerID, const string & strMyNymID)
10713 {
10714     string strExpiredBox = OTAPI_Wrap::LoadExpiredBox(strServerID, strMyNymID); // Returns NULL, or an expired box.
10715 
10716     if (!VerifyStringVal(strExpiredBox))
10717     {
10718         OTAPI_Wrap::Output(0, "\n\n details_show_expired_records: OT_API_LoadExpiredBox: Failed.\n\n");
10719         return -1;
10720     }
10721     // Success!
10722     OTAPI_Wrap::Output(0, "\n\n"); // stderr
10723     //  print(strExpiredBox)      // stdout
10724 
10725     int32_t nCount = OTAPI_Wrap::Ledger_GetCount(strServerID, strMyNymID, strMyNymID, strExpiredBox);
10726     if (VerifyIntVal(nCount))
10727     {
10728         OTAPI_Wrap::Output(0, "SHOW EXPIRED RECORDS: \n\n");
10729         OTAPI_Wrap::Output(0, "Idx  Amt  Type        Txn# InRef#|User / Acct\n");
10730         OTAPI_Wrap::Output(0, "---------------------------------|(from or to)\n");
10731 
10732         for (int32_t nIndex = 0; nIndex < nCount; ++nIndex)
10733         {
10734             if (!details_show_expired(strServerID, strMyNymID, nIndex, strExpiredBox))
10735             {
10736                 OTAPI_Wrap::Output(0, "details_show_expired_records: Error calling details_show_expired.\n");
10737                 return -1;
10738             }
10739         } // for
10740     } // VerifyIntVal (nCount)
10741 
10742     return 1;
10743 }
10744 
10745 
10746 OT_COMMANDS_OT int32_t OT_Command::main_show_expired()
10747 {
10748     string strLocation = "main_show_expired";
10749 
10750     // SHOW EXPIRED RECORD BOX
10751     //
10752     if (VerifyExists("MyNym") && VerifyExists("Server"))
10753     {
10754         string strMyNymID = MyNym;
10755         string strServerID = Server;
10756 
10757         // expiredbox for MyNym contains the old payments (in and out.)
10758 
10759         OTAPI_Wrap::Output(0, "\n\nNote: OT is completely done with these expired records. A proper GUI will sweep them out\nperiodically and archive them somewhere, or just erase them. All you can do at the\ncommand line (using this tool) is view them, or erase them using: opentxs clearexpired \n\n");
10760         OTAPI_Wrap::Output(0, "\nArchived Nym-related expired records (" + strMyNymID + "): \n");
10761 
10762         return details_show_expired_records(strServerID, strMyNymID);
10763     }
10764 
10765     return -1;
10766 }
10767 
10768 
10769 OT_COMMANDS_OT int32_t OT_Command::main_show_inbox()
10770 {
10771 
10772     // SHOW INBOX
10773     //
10774     // Load an asset account's inbox from local storage and display it on the screen.
10775     //
10776 
10777     if (VerifyExists("MyAcct"))
10778     {
10779 
10780         // HERE, WE LOOK UP THE NYM ID, BASED ON THE ACCOUNT ID.
10781         //
10782         string strMyNymID = OTAPI_Wrap::GetAccountWallet_NymID(MyAcct);
10783 
10784         if (!VerifyStringVal(strMyNymID))
10785         {
10786             OTAPI_Wrap::Output(0, "Failure: Unable to find NymID based on myacct. Use: --myacct ACCT_ID\n");
10787             OTAPI_Wrap::Output(0, "The designated asset account must be yours. OT will find the Nym based on the account.\n\n");
10788             return -1;
10789         }
10790 
10791         // HERE, WE LOOK UP THE SERVER ID, BASED ON THE ACCOUNT ID.
10792         //
10793         string strServerID = OTAPI_Wrap::GetAccountWallet_ServerID(MyAcct);
10794 
10795         if (!VerifyStringVal(strServerID))
10796         {
10797             OTAPI_Wrap::Output(0, "Failure: Unable to find Server ID based on myacct. Use: --myacct ACCT_ID\n");
10798             OTAPI_Wrap::Output(0, "The designated asset account must be yours. OT will find the Server based on the account.\n\n");
10799             return -1;
10800         }
10801         // ***************************************************************
10802 
10803         string strInbox = OTAPI_Wrap::LoadInbox(strServerID, strMyNymID, MyAcct); // Returns NULL, or an inbox.
10804 
10805         if (!VerifyStringVal(strInbox))
10806         {
10807             OTAPI_Wrap::Output(0, "\n Unable to load asset account inbox. ( " + MyAcct + " )\n Perhaps it doesn't exist yet?\n\n");
10808             return -1;
10809         }
10810         else // Success!
10811         {
10812             OTAPI_Wrap::Output(0, "\n"); // stderr
10813             //          print(strInbox)          // stdout
10814 
10815             int32_t nCount = OTAPI_Wrap::Ledger_GetCount(strServerID, strMyNymID, MyAcct, strInbox);
10816             if (VerifyIntVal(nCount))
10817             {
10818                 if (nCount > 0)
10819                 {
10820                     OTAPI_Wrap::Output(0, "Show inbox for an asset account  (" + MyAcct + "): \n");
10821                     OTAPI_Wrap::Output(0, "Idx  Amt  Type        Txn# InRef#|User / Acct\n");
10822                     OTAPI_Wrap::Output(0, "---------------------------------|(from or to)\n");
10823 
10824                     for (int32_t nIndex = 0; nIndex < nCount; ++nIndex)
10825                     {
10826                         string strTrans = OTAPI_Wrap::Ledger_GetTransactionByIndex(strServerID, strMyNymID, MyAcct, strInbox, nIndex);
10827                         int64_t lTransID = OTAPI_Wrap::Ledger_GetTransactionIDByIndex(strServerID, strMyNymID, MyAcct, strInbox, nIndex);
10828                         int64_t lRefNum = OTAPI_Wrap::Transaction_GetDisplayReferenceToNum(strServerID, strMyNymID, MyAcct, strTrans);
10829                         int64_t lAmount = OTAPI_Wrap::Transaction_GetAmount(strServerID, strMyNymID, MyAcct, strTrans);
10830                         string strType = OTAPI_Wrap::Transaction_GetType(strServerID, strMyNymID, MyAcct, strTrans);
10831                         string strSenderUserID = OTAPI_Wrap::Transaction_GetSenderUserID(strServerID, strMyNymID, MyAcct, strTrans);
10832                         string strSenderAcctID = OTAPI_Wrap::Transaction_GetSenderAcctID(strServerID, strMyNymID, MyAcct, strTrans);
10833                         string strRecipientUserID = OTAPI_Wrap::Transaction_GetRecipientUserID(strServerID, strMyNymID, MyAcct, strTrans);
10834                         string strRecipientAcctID = OTAPI_Wrap::Transaction_GetRecipientAcctID(strServerID, strMyNymID, MyAcct, strTrans);
10835 
10836                         string strUserID = VerifyStringVal(strSenderUserID) ? strSenderUserID : strRecipientUserID;
10837                         string strAcctID = VerifyStringVal(strSenderAcctID) ? strSenderAcctID : strRecipientAcctID;
10838 
10839                         bool bUserIDExists = VerifyStringVal(strUserID);
10840                         bool bAcctIDExists = VerifyStringVal(strAcctID);
10841 
10842                         string strNewlineSeparator = "";
10843 
10844                         if (bUserIDExists || bAcctIDExists)
10845                         {
10846                             strNewlineSeparator = "\n                                 |";
10847                         }
10848 
10849                         string strSeparator = (!bUserIDExists && !bAcctIDExists) ? "" : strNewlineSeparator;
10850 
10851                         string strUserDenoter = (bUserIDExists ? "U:" : "");
10852                         string strAcctDenoter = (bAcctIDExists ? "A:" : "");
10853 
10854                         string strAssetTypeID = bAcctIDExists ? OTAPI_Wrap::GetAccountWallet_AssetTypeID(strAcctID) : "";
10855 
10856                         string strAmount = VerifyIntVal(lAmount) ? (VerifyStringVal(strAssetTypeID) ? OTAPI_Wrap::FormatAmount(strAssetTypeID, lAmount) : to_string(lAmount)) : "UNKNOWN_AMOUNT";
10857 
10858                         OTAPI_Wrap::Output(0, to_string(nIndex) + "    ");
10859                         OTAPI_Wrap::Output(0, strAmount + (strAmount.size() < 3 ? "    " : "   "));
10860                         OTAPI_Wrap::Output(0, strType);
10861                         OTAPI_Wrap::Output(0, strType.size() > 10 ? " " : "    ");
10862                         OTAPI_Wrap::Output(0, to_string(lTransID) + (to_string(lTransID).size() < 2 ? "    " : "   "));
10863                         OTAPI_Wrap::Output(0, to_string(lRefNum) + (to_string(lRefNum).size() > 2 ? "  " : " ") + "|");
10864                         OTAPI_Wrap::Output(0, strUserDenoter + strUserID + strSeparator + strAcctDenoter + strAcctID + "\n");
10865                     } // for
10866 
10867                     OTAPI_Wrap::Output(0, "\n For the above, try: accepttransfers, acceptreceipts, acceptinbox, acceptmoney, or acceptall.\n");
10868                 }
10869                 else
10870                 {
10871                     OTAPI_Wrap::Output(0, "\n Asset account inbox ( " + MyAcct + " ) is empty.\n");
10872                 }
10873 
10874             } // VerifyIntVal (nCount)
10875 
10876             return 1;
10877         }
10878     }
10879     return -1;
10880 }
10881 
10882 
10883 OT_COMMANDS_OT int32_t OT_Command::main_show_outbox()
10884 {
10885 
10886     // SHOW OUTPUT
10887     //
10888     // Load an asset account's outbox from local storage and display it on the screen.
10889     //
10890     string strUsage = "-----------------------------------------------\nUSAGE:   outbox --myacct MY_ACCT_ID\n";
10891     OTAPI_Wrap::Output(0, strUsage);
10892 
10893     if (VerifyExists("MyAcct"))
10894     {
10895 
10896         // HERE, WE LOOK UP THE NYM ID, BASED ON THE ACCOUNT ID.
10897         //
10898         string strMyNymID = OTAPI_Wrap::GetAccountWallet_NymID(MyAcct);
10899 
10900         if (!VerifyStringVal(strMyNymID))
10901         {
10902             OTAPI_Wrap::Output(0, "Failure: Unable to find NymID based on myacct. Use: --myacct ACCT_ID\n");
10903             OTAPI_Wrap::Output(0, "The designated asset account must be yours. OT will find the Nym based on the account.\n\n");
10904             return -1;
10905         }
10906 
10907         // HERE, WE LOOK UP THE SERVER ID, BASED ON THE ACCOUNT ID.
10908         //
10909         string strServerID = OTAPI_Wrap::GetAccountWallet_ServerID(MyAcct);
10910 
10911         if (!VerifyStringVal(strServerID))
10912         {
10913             OTAPI_Wrap::Output(0, "Failure: Unable to find Server ID based on myacct. Use: --myacct ACCT_ID\n");
10914             OTAPI_Wrap::Output(0, "The designated asset account must be yours. OT will find the Server based on the account.\n\n");
10915             return -1;
10916         }
10917         // ***************************************************************
10918 
10919         string strOutbox = OTAPI_Wrap::LoadOutbox(strServerID, strMyNymID, MyAcct); // Returns NULL, or an outbox.
10920 
10921         if (!VerifyStringVal(strOutbox))
10922         {
10923             OTAPI_Wrap::Output(0, "\n\n OT_API_LoadOutbox: Failed.\n\n");
10924             return -1;
10925         }
10926         else // Success!
10927         {
10928             OTAPI_Wrap::Output(0, "\n"); // stderr
10929             //          print(strOutbox)         // stdout
10930 
10931             int32_t nCount = OTAPI_Wrap::Ledger_GetCount(strServerID, strMyNymID, MyAcct, strOutbox);
10932             if (VerifyIntVal(nCount))
10933             {
10934                 OTAPI_Wrap::Output(0, "===> SHOW OUTBOX: \n");
10935 
10936                 if (nCount <= 0)
10937                 {
10938                     OTAPI_Wrap::Output(0, "\nAsset account outbox is empty for account: " + MyAcct + "\n\n--------------------------------------------\n");
10939                 }
10940                 else
10941                 {
10942                     OTAPI_Wrap::Output(0, "\nIdx  Amt  Type        Txn# InRef#|User / Acct\n");
10943                     OTAPI_Wrap::Output(0, "---------------------------------|(from or to)\n");
10944 
10945                     for (int32_t nIndex = 0; nIndex < nCount; ++nIndex)
10946                     {
10947                         string strTrans = OTAPI_Wrap::Ledger_GetTransactionByIndex(strServerID, strMyNymID, MyAcct, strOutbox, nIndex);
10948                         int64_t lTransID = OTAPI_Wrap::Ledger_GetTransactionIDByIndex(strServerID, strMyNymID, MyAcct, strOutbox, nIndex);
10949                         int64_t lRefNum = OTAPI_Wrap::Transaction_GetDisplayReferenceToNum(strServerID, strMyNymID, MyAcct, strTrans);
10950                         int64_t lAmount = OTAPI_Wrap::Transaction_GetAmount(strServerID, strMyNymID, MyAcct, strTrans);
10951                         string strType = OTAPI_Wrap::Transaction_GetType(strServerID, strMyNymID, MyAcct, strTrans);
10952                         string strSenderUserID = OTAPI_Wrap::Transaction_GetSenderUserID(strServerID, strMyNymID, MyAcct, strTrans);
10953                         string strSenderAcctID = OTAPI_Wrap::Transaction_GetSenderAcctID(strServerID, strMyNymID, MyAcct, strTrans);
10954                         string strRecipientUserID = OTAPI_Wrap::Transaction_GetRecipientUserID(strServerID, strMyNymID, MyAcct, strTrans);
10955                         string strRecipientAcctID = OTAPI_Wrap::Transaction_GetRecipientAcctID(strServerID, strMyNymID, MyAcct, strTrans);
10956 
10957                         string strUserID = strRecipientUserID;
10958                         string strAcctID = strRecipientAcctID;
10959 
10960                         bool bUserIDExists = VerifyStringVal(strUserID);
10961                         bool bAcctIDExists = VerifyStringVal(strAcctID);
10962 
10963                         string strNewlineSeparator = "";
10964 
10965                         if (bUserIDExists || bAcctIDExists)
10966                         {
10967                             strNewlineSeparator = "\n                                 |";
10968                         }
10969 
10970                         string strSeparator = (!bUserIDExists && !bAcctIDExists) ? "" : strNewlineSeparator;
10971 
10972                         string strUserDenoter = (bUserIDExists ? "U:" : "");
10973                         string strAcctDenoter = (bAcctIDExists ? "A:" : "");
10974 
10975                         string strAssetTypeID = bAcctIDExists ? OTAPI_Wrap::GetAccountWallet_AssetTypeID(strAcctID) : "";
10976 
10977                         string strAmount = VerifyIntVal(lAmount) ? (VerifyStringVal(strAssetTypeID) ? OTAPI_Wrap::FormatAmount(strAssetTypeID, lAmount) : to_string(lAmount)) : "UNKNOWN_AMOUNT";
10978 
10979                         OTAPI_Wrap::Output(0, to_string(nIndex) + "    ");
10980                         OTAPI_Wrap::Output(0, strAmount + (strAmount.size() < 3 ? "    " : "   "));
10981                         OTAPI_Wrap::Output(0, strType);
10982                         OTAPI_Wrap::Output(0, strType.size() > 10 ? " " : "    ");
10983                         OTAPI_Wrap::Output(0, to_string(lTransID) + (to_string(lTransID).size() < 2 ? "    " : "   "));
10984                         OTAPI_Wrap::Output(0, to_string(lRefNum) + (to_string(lRefNum).size() > 2 ? "  " : " ") + "|");
10985                         OTAPI_Wrap::Output(0, strUserDenoter + strUserID + strSeparator + strAcctDenoter + strAcctID + "\n");
10986                     } // for
10987                 }
10988             } // VerifyIntVal (nCount)
10989 
10990             return 1;
10991         }
10992     }
10993     return -1;
10994 }
10995 
10996 
10997 OT_COMMANDS_OT int32_t OT_Command::show_mail_message(const string & strMyNymID, const int32_t nIndex, const bool bShowContents)
10998 {
10999     bool bMailVerified = OTAPI_Wrap::Nym_VerifyMailByIndex(strMyNymID, nIndex);
11000 
11001     if (!VerifyBoolVal(bMailVerified))
11002     {
11003         OTAPI_Wrap::Output(0, "Error: bad result from OT_API_Nym_VerifyMailByIndex at Index: " + to_string(nIndex) + "\n");
11004         return false;
11005     }
11006 
11007     if (!bMailVerified) // 1 meaning OT_TRUE.
11008     {
11009         print("UNVERIFIED mail! At index: " + to_string(nIndex));
11010         //      return false;
11011     }
11012 
11013     else
11014     {
11015         print("------------------------------\nVerified mail at index: " + to_string(nIndex));
11016     }
11017 
11018     string strMailServerID = OTAPI_Wrap::GetNym_MailServerIDByIndex(strMyNymID, nIndex);
11019     string strMailSenderID = OTAPI_Wrap::GetNym_MailSenderIDByIndex(strMyNymID, nIndex);
11020     string strMailContents = OTAPI_Wrap::GetNym_MailContentsByIndex(strMyNymID, nIndex);
11021 
11022     if (VerifyStringVal(strMailSenderID))
11023     {
11024         string strName = OTAPI_Wrap::GetNym_Name(strMailSenderID);
11025         if (!VerifyStringVal(strName)) { strName = ""; }
11026         print("Mail from: " + strMailSenderID + " \"" + strName + "\" ");
11027     }
11028     if (VerifyStringVal(strMailServerID))
11029     {
11030         string strName = OTAPI_Wrap::GetServer_Name(strMailServerID);
11031         if (!VerifyStringVal(strName)) { strName = ""; }
11032         print("Server ID: " + strMailServerID + " \"" + strName + "\" ");
11033     }
11034     if (bShowContents && VerifyStringVal(strMailContents))
11035     {
11036         print("Contents:\n" + strMailContents + "\n");
11037     }
11038 
11039     return true;
11040 }
11041 
11042 
11043 OT_COMMANDS_OT int32_t OT_Command::details_del_mail(const string & strMyNymID, const string & strIndices)
11044 {
11045 
11046     int32_t nCount = OTAPI_Wrap::GetNym_MailCount(strMyNymID);
11047     if (!VerifyIntVal(nCount))
11048     {
11049         OTAPI_Wrap::Output(0, "Error: bad result from OT_API_GetNym_MailCount for Nym: " + strMyNymID + "\n");
11050         return -1;
11051     }
11052 
11053     if (0 == nCount)
11054     {
11055         OTAPI_Wrap::Output(0, "\n(Mail is empty.)\n\n");
11056         return 0;
11057     }
11058 
11059     bool bIndices = VerifyStringVal(strIndices);
11060     bool bDeleteAll = false;
11061 
11062     if (bIndices && ("all" == strIndices))
11063     {
11064         bDeleteAll = true;
11065     }
11066 
11067     int32_t nIndicesCount = (bIndices && !bDeleteAll) ? OTAPI_Wrap::NumList_Count(strIndices) : 0;
11068 
11069     // If we're not deleting ALL, then we must be deleting SPECIFC indices.
11070     // But no specific indices were supplied!
11071     // Therefore, error.
11072     //
11073     if (!bDeleteAll && (nIndicesCount < 1))
11074     {
11075         OTAPI_Wrap::Output(0, "Problem: You're apparently not deleting \"all\" indices, but neither have you selected SPECIFIC indices.\n Try adding: --args \"indices 4,6,7\" (for deleting the messages at indices 4, 6, and 7, for example.)\n\n");
11076         return -1;
11077     }
11078 
11079     int32_t nReturnVal = 1;
11080 
11081     for (int32_t nIndex = (nCount - 1); nIndex >= 0; --nIndex)
11082     {
11083 
11084         // If we're not deleting "all" (i.e. we're deleting specific indices)...
11085         // and the current index doesn't appear on that specified list, then continue...
11086         //
11087         if (!bDeleteAll && !OTAPI_Wrap::NumList_VerifyQuery(strIndices, to_string(nIndex)))
11088         {
11089             // We skip any indices that the user isn't trying to delete.
11090             //          continue   // apparently not supported by the language.
11091         }
11092 
11093         // Let's try to remove it...
11094         //
11095         else if (OTAPI_Wrap::Nym_RemoveMailByIndex(strMyNymID, nIndex))
11096         {
11097             OTAPI_Wrap::Output(0, "Deleted mail at index " + to_string(nIndex) + " for nym: " + strMyNymID + " \n");
11098         }
11099         else
11100         {
11101             OTAPI_Wrap::Output(0, "Error while trying to delete mail at index " + to_string(nIndex) + " for nym: " + strMyNymID + " \n");
11102             nReturnVal = -1;
11103         }
11104     } // for
11105 
11106     return nReturnVal;
11107 }
11108 
11109 
11110 OT_COMMANDS_OT int32_t OT_Command::main_del_mail()
11111 {
11112     string strUsage = "USAGE:   delmail --mynym MY_NYM_ID --args \"index 5\"  (To delete message 5.)\n Also, try: --args \"indices all\" (for all messages)\n As well as: --args \"indices 3,5,6\" (for messages 3, 5, and 6)\n\n";
11113     OTAPI_Wrap::Output(0, strUsage);
11114 
11115     if (VerifyExists("MyNym"))
11116     {
11117         string strIndices = "";
11118 
11119         if (VerifyExists("Args", false))
11120         {
11121             // std::string OT_CLI_GetValueByKey(const std::string str_Args,
11122             //                                  const std::string str_key)
11123             //
11124             // OPTION:   --args "key value key value"
11125             // EXAMPLE:  --args "index 5 "
11126             //
11127 
11128             string strIndex = OT_CLI_GetValueByKey(Args, "index");
11129 
11130             if (VerifyStringVal(strIndex))
11131             {
11132                 strIndices = strIndex;
11133             }
11134 
11135             string strTempIndices = OT_CLI_GetValueByKey(Args, "indices");
11136 
11137             if (VerifyStringVal(strTempIndices))
11138             {
11139                 strIndices = strTempIndices;
11140             }
11141         }
11142 
11143         int32_t nDetails = details_del_mail(MyNym, strIndices);
11144         return nDetails;
11145     }
11146 
11147     return -1;
11148 }
11149 
11150 
11151 OT_COMMANDS_OT int32_t OT_Command::main_show_mail()
11152 {
11153     string strUsage = "USAGE:   mail --mynym MY_NYM_ID   (To list all the mail messages for mynym.)\n Also:   mail --args \"index 5\"  (To examine a specific message.)\n\n";
11154     OTAPI_Wrap::Output(0, strUsage);
11155 
11156     if (!VerifyExists("MyNym"))
11157     {
11158         return -1;
11159     }
11160 
11161     int32_t nCount = OTAPI_Wrap::GetNym_MailCount(MyNym);
11162     if (!VerifyIntVal(nCount))
11163     {
11164         OTAPI_Wrap::Output(0, "Error: bad result from OT_API_GetNym_MailCount for Nym: " + MyNym + "\n");
11165         return -1;
11166     }
11167 
11168     if (0 == nCount)
11169     {
11170         OTAPI_Wrap::Output(0, "\n(Mail is empty.)\n\n");
11171         return 0;
11172     }
11173 
11174     string strIndex = "";
11175     int32_t nIndex = -1;
11176 
11177     if (VerifyExists("Args", false))
11178     {
11179         // std::string OT_CLI_GetValueByKey(const std::string str_Args,
11180         //                                  const std::string str_key)
11181         //
11182         // OPTION:   --args "key value key value"
11183         // EXAMPLE:  --args "index 5 "
11184         //
11185         strIndex = OT_CLI_GetValueByKey(Args, "index");
11186 
11187         if (VerifyStringVal(strIndex))
11188         {
11189             nIndex = to_int(strIndex);
11190         }
11191     }
11192 
11193     //
11194     int32_t nReturnVal = 1;
11195 
11196     if (nIndex > -1)
11197     {
11198         nReturnVal = show_mail_message(MyNym, nIndex, true) ? 1 : -1;
11199     }
11200     else
11201     {
11202         OTAPI_Wrap::Output(0, "\n Mail contents:\n\n");
11203 
11204         for (nIndex = 0; nIndex < nCount; ++nIndex)
11205         {
11206             if (!show_mail_message(MyNym, nIndex, false))
11207             {
11208                 OTAPI_Wrap::Output(0, "show_mail_message returned false. I'll finish out the loop, but that's weird.\n");
11209                 nReturnVal = -1;
11210             }
11211         }
11212     }
11213     return nReturnVal;
11214 }
11215 
11216 //pScript->chai.add(fun(&OTAPI_Wrap::Nym_RemoveMailByIndex), "OT_API_Nym_RemoveMailByIndex");
11217 
11218 
11219 OT_COMMANDS_OT int32_t OT_Command::show_outmail_message(const string & strMyNymID, const int32_t nIndex, const bool bShowContents)
11220 {
11221     bool bMailVerified = OTAPI_Wrap::Nym_VerifyOutmailByIndex(strMyNymID, nIndex);
11222 
11223     if (!VerifyBoolVal(bMailVerified))
11224     {
11225         OTAPI_Wrap::Output(0, "Error: bad result from OT_API_Nym_VerifyOutmailByIndex at Index: " + to_string(nIndex) + "\n");
11226         return false;
11227     }
11228 
11229     if (!bMailVerified) // 1 meaning OT_TRUE.
11230     {
11231         print("UNVERIFIED sent (outgoing) mail! At index: " + to_string(nIndex) + "\n");
11232         //      return false;
11233     }
11234 
11235     else
11236     {
11237         print("--------------------------------------------------------\nVerified outmail at index: " + to_string(nIndex));
11238     }
11239 
11240     string strMailServerID = OTAPI_Wrap::GetNym_OutmailServerIDByIndex(strMyNymID, nIndex);
11241     string strMailRecipientID = OTAPI_Wrap::GetNym_OutmailRecipientIDByIndex(strMyNymID, nIndex);
11242     string strMailContents = OTAPI_Wrap::GetNym_OutmailContentsByIndex(strMyNymID, nIndex);
11243 
11244     if (VerifyStringVal(strMailRecipientID))
11245     {
11246         print("Mail was sent to: " + strMailRecipientID);
11247     }
11248     if (VerifyStringVal(strMailServerID))
11249     {
11250         print("At server ID: " + strMailServerID);
11251     }
11252     if (bShowContents && VerifyStringVal(strMailContents))
11253     {
11254         print("Contents:\n" + strMailContents + "\n");
11255     }
11256     return true;
11257 }
11258 
11259 
11260 OT_COMMANDS_OT int32_t OT_Command::main_show_outmail()
11261 {
11262     string strUsage = "USAGE:   outmail --mynym MY_NYM_ID   (To list all the sent mail messages for mynym.)\n Also:   outmail --args \"index 5\"  (To examine a specific message.)\n\n";
11263     OTAPI_Wrap::Output(0, strUsage);
11264 
11265     if (!VerifyExists("MyNym"))
11266     {
11267         return -1;
11268     }
11269 
11270     int32_t nCount = OTAPI_Wrap::GetNym_OutmailCount(MyNym);
11271     if (!VerifyIntVal(nCount))
11272     {
11273         OTAPI_Wrap::Output(0, "Error: bad result from OT_API_GetNym_OutmailCount for Nym: " + MyNym + "\n");
11274         return -1;
11275     }
11276 
11277     if (0 == nCount)
11278     {
11279         OTAPI_Wrap::Output(0, "\n(Outmail box is empty.)\n\n");
11280         return 0;
11281     }
11282 
11283     string strIndex = "";
11284     int32_t nIndex = -1;
11285 
11286     if (VerifyExists("Args", false))
11287     {
11288         // std::string OT_CLI_GetValueByKey(const std::string str_Args,
11289         //                                  const std::string str_key)
11290         //
11291         // OPTION:   --args "key value key value"
11292         // EXAMPLE:  --args "index 5 "
11293         //
11294         strIndex = OT_CLI_GetValueByKey(Args, "index");
11295 
11296         if (VerifyStringVal(strIndex))
11297         {
11298             nIndex = to_int(strIndex);
11299         }
11300     }
11301 
11302     int32_t nReturnVal = 1;
11303 
11304     if (nIndex > -1)
11305     {
11306         nReturnVal = show_outmail_message(MyNym, nIndex, true) ? 1 : -1;
11307     }
11308     else
11309     {
11310         for (nIndex = 0; nIndex < nCount; ++nIndex)
11311         {
11312             if (!show_outmail_message(MyNym, nIndex, false))
11313             {
11314                 OTAPI_Wrap::Output(0, "show_outmail_message returned false. I'll finish out the loop, but that's weird.\n");
11315                 nReturnVal = -1;
11316             }
11317         }
11318     }
11319 
11320     return nReturnVal;
11321 }
11322 
11323 
11324 OT_COMMANDS_OT int32_t OT_Command::details_del_outmail(const string & strMyNymID, const string & strIndices)
11325 {
11326 
11327     int32_t nCount = OTAPI_Wrap::GetNym_OutmailCount(strMyNymID);
11328     if (!VerifyIntVal(nCount))
11329     {
11330         OTAPI_Wrap::Output(0, "Error: bad result from OT_API_GetNym_OutmailCount for Nym: " + strMyNymID + "\n");
11331         return -1;
11332     }
11333 
11334     if (0 == nCount)
11335     {
11336         OTAPI_Wrap::Output(0, "\n(Outgoing mail is empty.)\n\n");
11337         return 0;
11338     }
11339 
11340     bool bIndices = VerifyStringVal(strIndices);
11341     bool bDeleteAll = false;
11342 
11343     if (bIndices && ("all" == strIndices))
11344     {
11345         bDeleteAll = true;
11346     }
11347 
11348     int32_t nIndicesCount = (bIndices && !bDeleteAll) ? OTAPI_Wrap::NumList_Count(strIndices) : 0;
11349 
11350     // If we're not deleting ALL, then we must be deleting SPECIFC indices.
11351     // But no specific indices were supplied!
11352     // Therefore, error.
11353     //
11354     if (!bDeleteAll && (nIndicesCount < 1))
11355     {
11356         OTAPI_Wrap::Output(0, "Problem: You're apparently not deleting \"all\" indices, but neither have you selected SPECIFIC indices.\n Try adding: --args \"indices 4,6,7\" (for deleting the outgoing messages at indices 4, 6, and 7, for example.)\n\n");
11357         return -1;
11358     }
11359 
11360     int32_t nReturnVal = 1;
11361 
11362     for (int32_t nIndex = (nCount - 1); nIndex >= 0; --nIndex)
11363     {
11364 
11365         // If we're not deleting "all" (i.e. we're deleting specific indices)...
11366         // and the current index doesn't appear on that specified list, then continue...
11367         //
11368         if (!bDeleteAll && !OTAPI_Wrap::NumList_VerifyQuery(strIndices, to_string(nIndex)))
11369         {
11370             // We skip any indices that the user isn't trying to delete.
11371             //          continue // apparently not supported by the language.
11372         }
11373 
11374         // Let's try to remove it...
11375         //
11376         else if (OTAPI_Wrap::Nym_RemoveOutmailByIndex(strMyNymID, nIndex))
11377         {
11378             OTAPI_Wrap::Output(0, "Deleted outgoing mail at index " + to_string(nIndex) + " for nym: " + strMyNymID + " \n");
11379         }
11380         else
11381         {
11382             OTAPI_Wrap::Output(0, "Error while trying to delete outgoing mail at index " + to_string(nIndex) + " for nym: " + strMyNymID + " \n");
11383             nReturnVal = -1;
11384         }
11385     } // for
11386 
11387     return nReturnVal;
11388 }
11389 
11390 
11391 OT_COMMANDS_OT int32_t OT_Command::main_del_outmail()
11392 {
11393     string strUsage = "USAGE:   deloutmail --mynym MY_NYM_ID --args \"index 5\"  (To delete outmail message 5.)\n Also, try: --args \"indices all\" (for all outgoing messages)\n As well as: --args \"indices 3,5,6\" (for outgoing messages 3, 5, and 6)\n\n";
11394     OTAPI_Wrap::Output(0, strUsage);
11395 
11396     if (VerifyExists("MyNym"))
11397     {
11398         string strIndices = "";
11399 
11400         if (VerifyExists("Args", false))
11401         {
11402             // std::string OT_CLI_GetValueByKey(const std::string str_Args,
11403             //                                  const std::string str_key)
11404             //
11405             // OPTION:   --args "key value key value"
11406             // EXAMPLE:  --args "index 5 "
11407             //
11408 
11409             string strIndex = OT_CLI_GetValueByKey(Args, "index");
11410 
11411             if (VerifyStringVal(strIndex))
11412             {
11413                 strIndices = strIndex;
11414             }
11415 
11416             string strTempIndices = OT_CLI_GetValueByKey(Args, "indices");
11417 
11418             if (VerifyStringVal(strTempIndices))
11419             {
11420                 strIndices = strTempIndices;
11421             }
11422         }
11423 
11424         int32_t nDetails = details_del_outmail(MyNym, strIndices);
11425         return nDetails;
11426     }
11427 
11428     return -1;
11429 }
11430 
11431 
11432 OT_COMMANDS_OT bool OT_Command::show_outpayment(const string & strMyNym, const int32_t nIndex, const bool bShowInFull)
11433 {
11434     bool bMailVerified = OTAPI_Wrap::Nym_VerifyOutpaymentsByIndex(strMyNym, nIndex);
11435 
11436     if (!VerifyBoolVal(bMailVerified))
11437     {
11438         OTAPI_Wrap::Output(0, "Error: bad result from OT_API_Nym_VerifyOutpaymentsByIndex at Index: " + to_string(nIndex) + "\n");
11439         return false;
11440     }
11441 
11442     if (!bMailVerified) // 1 meaning OT_TRUE.
11443     {
11444         print("UNVERIFIED sent (outgoing) payment! At index: " + to_string(nIndex));
11445         //      return false;
11446     }
11447 
11448     else
11449     {
11450         print("\n----------------------------------------------\n(index " + to_string(nIndex) + ")");
11451     }
11452 
11453     string strMailServerID = OTAPI_Wrap::GetNym_OutpaymentsServerIDByIndex(strMyNym, nIndex);
11454     string strMailRecipientID = OTAPI_Wrap::GetNym_OutpaymentsRecipientIDByIndex(strMyNym, nIndex);
11455     string strMailContents = OTAPI_Wrap::GetNym_OutpaymentsContentsByIndex(strMyNym, nIndex);
11456 
11457     if (VerifyStringVal(strMailContents))
11458     {
11459         int64_t lPaymentAmount = OTAPI_Wrap::Instrmnt_GetAmount(strMailContents);
11460         string strPaymentAmount = "UNKNOWN_PAYMENT_AMOUNT";
11461 
11462         if (VerifyIntVal(lPaymentAmount))
11463         {
11464             strPaymentAmount = to_string(lPaymentAmount);
11465         }
11466 
11467         string strPaymentAssetID = OTAPI_Wrap::Instrmnt_GetAssetID(strMailContents);
11468         string strPaymentType = OTAPI_Wrap::Instrmnt_GetType(strMailContents);
11469 
11470         string strFormatted = "";
11471         string strAssetTypeName = "";
11472 
11473         string strRecipientString = "";
11474         string strServerString = "";
11475 
11476         if (VerifyStringVal(strMailRecipientID))
11477         {
11478             string strName = OTAPI_Wrap::GetNym_Name(strMailRecipientID);
11479             if (!VerifyStringVal(strName)) { strName = ""; }
11480             strRecipientString = "Payment sent to: " + strMailRecipientID + " \"" + strName + "\" ";
11481         }
11482         if (VerifyStringVal(strMailServerID))
11483         {
11484             string strName = OTAPI_Wrap::GetServer_Name(strMailServerID);
11485             if (!VerifyStringVal(strName)) { strName = ""; }
11486             strServerString = "   At server ID: " + strMailServerID + " \"" + strName + "\" ";
11487         }
11488 
11489         if (VerifyStringVal(strPaymentAssetID))
11490         {
11491             strAssetTypeName = OTAPI_Wrap::GetAssetType_Name(strPaymentAssetID);
11492             if (!VerifyStringVal(strAssetTypeName)) { strAssetTypeName = ""; }
11493         }
11494         else
11495         {
11496             strPaymentAssetID = "UNKNOWN_ASSET_ID";
11497         }
11498 
11499         if (VerifyIntVal(lPaymentAmount))
11500         {
11501             if (!VerifyStringVal(strPaymentType)) { strPaymentType = "UNKNOWN_PAYMENT_TYPE"; }
11502             string strTempFormat;
11503             if ((lPaymentAmount > -1))
11504             {
11505                 strTempFormat = OTAPI_Wrap::FormatAmount(strPaymentAssetID, lPaymentAmount);
11506             }
11507             if (!VerifyStringVal(strTempFormat))  { strTempFormat = strPaymentAmount; }
11508 
11509             strFormatted = "( " + strPaymentType + ": " + strTempFormat + " )";
11510         }
11511 
11512         print("         Amount: " + strPaymentAmount + "  " + strFormatted);
11513         print(strRecipientString);
11514         print("  Of asset type: " + strPaymentAssetID + " \"" + strAssetTypeName + "\" ");
11515         print(strServerString);
11516 
11517         if (bShowInFull)
11518         {
11519             print("     Instrument: \n" + strMailContents + "\n");
11520         }
11521     }
11522     else
11523     {
11524         OTAPI_Wrap::Output(0, "Error: bad result from OT_API_GetNym_OutpaymentsContentsByIndex at Index: " + to_string(nIndex) + "\n");
11525         return false;
11526     }
11527 
11528     return true;
11529 }
11530 
11531 
11532 OT_COMMANDS_OT int32_t OT_Command::main_show_outpayment()
11533 {
11534     string strUsage = "USAGE:   outpayment --mynym MY_NYM_ID --args \"index 5\"   (for example)\nIf no index is specified, all outgoing payments are listed.\n";
11535     OTAPI_Wrap::Output(0, strUsage);
11536 
11537     if (!VerifyExists("MyNym"))
11538     {
11539         return -1;
11540     }
11541 
11542     string strIndex = "";
11543     int32_t nIndex = -1;
11544 
11545     if (VerifyExists("Args", false))
11546     {
11547         // std::string OT_CLI_GetValueByKey(const std::string str_Args,
11548         //                                  const std::string str_key)
11549         //
11550         // OPTION:   --args "key value key value"
11551         // EXAMPLE:  --args "index 5 "
11552         //
11553         strIndex = OT_CLI_GetValueByKey(Args, "index"); // OTNumList will be used for this value.
11554 
11555         if (VerifyStringVal(strIndex))
11556         {
11557             nIndex = to_int(strIndex);
11558         }
11559     }
11560 
11561     //
11562     int32_t nCount = OTAPI_Wrap::GetNym_OutpaymentsCount(MyNym);
11563     if (!VerifyIntVal(nCount))
11564     {
11565         OTAPI_Wrap::Output(0, "Error: bad result from OT_API_GetNym_OutpaymentsCount for Nym: " + MyNym + "\n");
11566         return -1;
11567     }
11568 
11569     if (0 == nCount)
11570     {
11571         OTAPI_Wrap::Output(0, "\nSent (outgoing) payments box is empty.\n\n");
11572         return 0;
11573     }
11574 
11575     if (!(nIndex < nCount))
11576     {
11577         OTAPI_Wrap::Output(0, "\nIndex (" + strIndex + ") out of bounds. (Acceptable range is 0 to " + to_string(nCount - 1) + ".)\n\n");
11578         return 0;
11579     }
11580 
11581     int32_t nReturnVal = 1;
11582 
11583     if (nIndex > -1)
11584     {
11585         if (!show_outpayment(MyNym, nIndex, true))  { nReturnVal = -1; }
11586     }
11587     else
11588     {
11589         OTAPI_Wrap::Output(0, "\n\n===> SHOW OUTGOING PAYMENTS:\n");
11590 
11591         for (nIndex = 0; nIndex < nCount; ++nIndex)
11592         {
11593             if (!show_outpayment(MyNym, nIndex, false))  { nReturnVal = -1; }
11594         }
11595     }
11596     return nReturnVal;
11597 }
11598 
11599 
11600 OT_COMMANDS_OT int32_t OT_Command::main_add_server()
11601 {
11602     OTAPI_Wrap::Output(0, "Please paste a server contract, followed by an EOF or a ~ by itself on a blank line:\n\n");
11603 
11604     // The reason we accept the tilde ~ on a blank line by itself, is because
11605     // the EOF, while it works, causes us not to be able to read any more input
11606     // from stdin. Stdin is considered "closed" for the duration of the run.
11607     // So the tilde allows us to read multiple times without closing stdin.
11608 
11609     string strContract = OT_CLI_ReadUntilEOF();
11610 
11611     if (!VerifyStringVal(strContract))
11612     {
11613         OTAPI_Wrap::Output(0, "\n\n Sorry, You must input a server contract, in order to add it to your wallet.\n\n");
11614         return -1;
11615     }
11616 
11617 
11618     int32_t nAdded = OTAPI_Wrap::AddServerContract(strContract);
11619 
11620     if (1 != nAdded)
11621     {
11622         OTAPI_Wrap::Output(0, "\n\n Sorry, failed. Are you sure that was a server contract?\n\n");
11623         return -1;
11624     }
11625 
11626     OTAPI_Wrap::Output(0, "\n\n Success adding server contract to your wallet.\n\n");
11627     return 1;
11628 }
11629 
11630 
11631 OT_COMMANDS_OT int32_t OT_Command::main_add_asset()
11632 {
11633     OTAPI_Wrap::Output(0, "Please paste a currency contract, followed by an EOF or a ~ by itself on a blank line:\n\n");
11634 
11635     // The reason we accept the tilde ~ on a blank line by itself, is because
11636     // the EOF, while it works, causes us not to be able to read any more input
11637     // from stdin. Stdin is considered "closed" for the duration of the run.
11638     // So the tilde allows us to read multiple times without closing stdin.
11639 
11640     string strContract = OT_CLI_ReadUntilEOF();
11641 
11642     if (!VerifyStringVal(strContract))
11643     {
11644         OTAPI_Wrap::Output(0, "\n\n Sorry, You must input a currency contract, in order to add it to your wallet.\n\n");
11645         return -1;
11646     }
11647 
11648 
11649     int32_t nAdded = OTAPI_Wrap::AddAssetContract(strContract);
11650 
11651     if (1 != nAdded)
11652     {
11653         OTAPI_Wrap::Output(0, "\n\n Sorry, failed. Are you sure that was an asset contract?\n\n");
11654         return -1;
11655     }
11656 
11657     OTAPI_Wrap::Output(0, "\n\n Success adding asset contract to your wallet.\n\n");
11658     return 1;
11659 }
11660 
11661 
11662 OT_COMMANDS_OT int32_t OT_Command::main_issue_asset()
11663 {
11664     string strUsage = concat("\n\nUsage: opentxs issueasset --server SERVER_ID --mynym NYM_ID\n\n",
11665         "       (NYM_ID must already be the 'contract' key on the new contract.)\n       See 'opentxs newasset' before running this script.\n\n");
11666 
11667     OTAPI_Wrap::Output(0, strUsage);
11668 
11669 
11670     if (VerifyExists("Server") && VerifyExists("MyNym"))
11671     {
11672         OTAPI_Wrap::Output(0, "Please paste a currency contract, followed by an EOF or a ~ by itself on a blank line:\n\n");
11673 
11674         // The reason we accept the tilde ~ on a blank line by itself, is because
11675         // the EOF, while it works, causes us not to be able to read any more input
11676         // from stdin. Stdin is considered "closed" for the duration of the run.
11677         // So the tilde allows us to read multiple times without closing stdin.
11678 
11679         string strContract = OT_CLI_ReadUntilEOF();
11680 
11681         if (!VerifyStringVal(strContract))
11682         {
11683             OTAPI_Wrap::Output(0, "\n\n Sorry, You must input a currency contract, in order to issue it on an OT server.\n\n");
11684             return -1;
11685         }
11686 
11687         if (!OTAPI_Wrap::IsNym_RegisteredAtServer(MyNym, Server))
11688         {
11689             // If the Nym's not registered at the server, then register him first.
11690             OT_Command::main_register_nym();
11691         }
11692 
11693         string strResponse = MadeEasy::issue_asset_type(Server, MyNym, strContract);
11694         int32_t nStatus = VerifyMessageSuccess(strResponse);
11695 
11696         // NOTICE: No need here to deal with retries, timeouts, request number,
11697         // syncing transaction number, download / process nymbox, etc! It's all
11698         // handled at a lower level!  Instead, simply check for success or failure:
11699         //
11700         // -1 is error,
11701         //  0 is reply received: failure
11702         //  1 is reply received: success
11703         //
11704         switch (nStatus)
11705         {
11706         case 1:
11707             OTAPI_Wrap::Output(0, "\n\n SUCCESS in issue_asset! Server response:\n\n");
11708             print(strResponse); // stdout
11709             break;
11710         case 0:
11711             OTAPI_Wrap::Output(0, "\n\n FAILURE in issue_asset! Server response:\n\n");
11712             print(strResponse); // stdout
11713             break;
11714         default:
11715             OTAPI_Wrap::Output(0, "\n\nError in issue_asset! nStatus is: " + to_string(nStatus) + "\n");
11716 
11717             if (VerifyStringVal(strResponse))
11718             {
11719                 OTAPI_Wrap::Output(0, "Server response:\n\n");
11720                 print(strResponse); // stdout
11721             }
11722             break;
11723         }
11724         OTAPI_Wrap::Output(0, "\n\n"); //stderr
11725 
11726         return (0 == nStatus) ? -1 : nStatus;
11727     }
11728 
11729     return -1;
11730 }
 All Classes Namespaces Files Functions Variables Typedefs Enumerations Enumerator Friends Defines
